AdsStrategy.title: Strategy Creation
AdsStrategy.subtitle: Introducing Woortec - the ultimate social media ads product designed to elevate your online presence and drive results like never before. With Woortec, you can effortlessly create and manage ads across multiple social media platforms, all in one place.

adCreative.title: Campaign Setup: Choose your Ad Creatives

campaignNamePage.title: Campaign Setup: Choose your Campaign Name
campaignNamePage.subtitle: Effortlessly set up your campaign name with Woortec. By default, it will be named 'Woortec,' but you can easily add a custom label to reflect your unique branding. Enjoy a straightforward process that ensures your campaigns are personalized and ready to make an impact.
campaignNamePage.formTitle: By default, your campaign will be named 'Woortec.' Want to personalize it? Add a custom label to tailor the campaign name to your specific needs and make it stand out.
campaignNamePage.saveError: Failed to save the data. Please try again.
campaignNamePage.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
